QuestData.Title: The Eye of Paleth
QuestData.Description: Opening the chest reveals a blackened orb, pulsing with an eerie light. This must be the foul Eye of Paleth that damned these sailors' souls.$B$BSuch corruption should be purged. Perhaps a priest in Menethil Harbor could help you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Cursed Eye of Paleth to Glorin Steelbrow at Menethil Harbor in Wetlands.
QuestData.RewardText: The Eye of Paleth? You say Fitzsimmons sent you out?$B$BBy the light...not again. Fitzsimmons is dead, $glad:lass;. You've not the first to come to me like this, either.
